business_logic_summary: This ecommerce database manages various aspects of an online store, including product information, order management, payment processing, customer interactions, and shipping logistics.
data_flow_patterns: One-to-Many Relationship between Orders and Order Items
Many-to-Many Relationship between Orders and Products
Many-to-One Relationship between Customers and Orders
One-to-Many Relationship between Orders and Reviews
One-to-Many Relationship between Products and Categories
recommendations: Implement a real-time inventory tracking system to optimize stock levels.
Enhance customer service through automated chatbots and personalized recommendations.
Regularly update product reviews to maintain high customer satisfaction.
Optimize payment processing to reduce transaction fees and improve customer experience.
Implement a robust data security policy to protect customer information.
